How many calls and texts are sent via Viber for Blackberry i

http://www.viberblackberry.com/2012/08/calls-texts-viber-blackberry-month/

We know that Viber Blackberry is the beta version application and allows only messaging facilities. It does not include any calling facility for now. So, here we should forget about the question – “Is there any calling limit in viber for blackberry”?

Now we move ahead with the second question “how many messages can we send in a month via viber application for blackberry”? So, firstly we would like to say that blackberry application for Viber allows you unlimited messaging.

Moreover, bandwidth will be used during conversation will be different as per chosen font type or language. Viber team tested the application and revealed that 1 SMS to be 828bytes for 500 US English characters. Charges can of course be eliminated completely if using WI-FI rather than 3G.

With use of this application one can send unlimited message for all platforms like images, location, text, etc. So, once blackberry users have installed Viber application then they will be free of all their worries .

Free international calls using MilliTalk from your iDevices

http://www.freecallshub.com/2012/08/free-international-calls-millitalk-idevices/

Communication with friends and family members is very important to most of us. It can be difficult to communicate with people that we know internationally when we don’t have the proper application installed to our PC’s or our phones to make the cheap international calls easier and cheaper. There are so many different platforms available for international phone calls nowadays that it might be a bit difficult to choose which app would be the right one for us. Things to consider would be the price, package deals, and what areas of the world the international service is available for.

As mentioned before there are several international services that you can choose from, but why not try one called MilliTalk? MilliTalk is an international calling service with low rates for calling across the world; no matter where you are in the world you can communicate with people.

MilliTalk Preview – 14 day trial
MilliTalk Free – Free to talk for a little while
MilliTalk – $39.99 per year Talk

Crowdcall offers free international calling – 10 calls dai

http://www.freecallshub.com/2012/08/crowdcall-offers-free-international-calling-10-calls-daily-40-countries/

With this crazy world of technology that we live in nowadays, many people often perform work tasks either over the phone with conference calls or online. A large business conference call might have one confused about whether or not they can afford to make a phone call for business purposes. If you have not already it’s time to hop onto the band wagon with a conference call application known as CrowdCall. CrowdCall is an application that is used for the purpose of conference calling colleagues that live in different nations across the world. Although it is not an app that is just limited to business people, it is often used by mainly business people.

CrowdCall is a rather popular calling software that is being used today by many people. To have a better idea of how popular this software is, there are about 1 million calls made each month by those that use it.

Republic wireless ($19 unlimited calls, text, data) is accep

I will not bear the exorbitant charges that my phone carrier levies on me today. I will move to Republic Wireless to enjoy the freedom. You gotta like this

If you have never heard of Republic Wireless then you should know that it is a new kind of mobile carrier that allows your mobile phone calls to run off of WiFi when available.

Make free phone calls and send free text from Your Second Ph

http://www.freecallshub.com/2012/08/free-phone-calls-send-free-text-phone-ysp/

YSP is short for an app that is called “Your Second Phone”. With this application you make normal 10 digit phone calls using the internet to call anywhere you’d like; you can make local phone calls or you can make international phone calls.

How this works is with the use of a feature that is located in your browser known as CallPoint. So what this means is that you can make phone calls with this feature. A special URL is assigned to you so that when someone enters it into the browser YSP calls you! This URL is your phone number. One thing that you should keep in mind is that the call point URLs are not permanent; they are temporary. The URL links will last for up to 6 hours after the first use, but if you call and stay on the call for longer than 6 hours you will still be able to talk for however long you’d like. In other words the 6 hours rule does not apply as long as you are on the phone talking.

WhatsApp Android with new look-WhatsApp PLUS

http://whatsappandroid.net/2012/06/whatsapp-android-with-new-look-whatsapp-plus/

Till now we have learnt many about the different features about the WhatsApp Android as well as its wide area acceptance. However, we know that nowadays, anything new once reveled then after developer team started continuous RND for that and same happen in case of WhatsApp Messenger.

When WhatsApp introduced it was the launch without any big announcement and its vast features make its accepted area more wide. Once the application became most popular for the large base of users, developer teams of the WhtasApp Messenger has started to make some creativity for this application. And after the long time they come with the new platform of WhatsApp Android, called WhatsApp Plus.

Key benefit of using Android smartphone is that out of the box, as Android supports many applications and out of them most are free and valuable to use. That’s why Android developer teams have has taken whatsapp for Android to WhatsApp PLUS.
